bookmarks.lblLimitWarning: Only five bookmarks allowed, please delete unused bookmarks to add this one.
bookmarks.lblExistsWarning: Bookmark already exists for this page.

evaluation.lblContent: Click the forward and back buttons to review the objectives from this episode.
evaluation.lblRestart: Do you want to try again?
evaluation.lblReview: I want to review the information I missed
evaluation.lblTestPassed: Excellent work on this episode! You selected the optimal choice on every decision point! You clearly know this mission topic well and are ready to move on in the course!
evaluation.lblTestFailed: I can tell that you are working hard to remember all of the cultural information you've learned so far, but unfortunately, your score does not allow you to move on in the course. Please review the information provided in the After Action Review below. It will help you to remember the cultural points necessary to perform better on your next try. When you feel that you are ready, play the episode again.
evaluation.lblEndInstructions: Click the buttons below to review the information you missed or play the scenario again.

lessonStart.lblTime: This lesson may contain multiple sections. The entire lesson will take approximately {0} minutes to complete.

posttest.lblResults: Thank you for taking the Post-Test. You have answered {0} out of {1} questions correctly. This score will not affect your course completion.

pretest.lblFailed:
Thank you for taking the test! Unfortunately, your score does not qualify you to test out of any portion of the course.

Click "Next" to go to the first lesson in your required Course of Instruction.
pretest.lblPassed:
Congratulations! Your score qualifies you to test out of portions of the course. Review the lessons below for which you can receive credit, then check the "Accept Credit" button if you wish to accept credit for those lessons, or the "Do Not Accept Credit" button if you don't.

If you choose not to accept credit for the lessons, you will have to take them as part of your required Course of Instruction (COI), and score at least 80% on the lesson quizzes.

quizEnd.lblPassed: Your score was {0}%. Congratulations! You have successfully completed this section. You may now move on to the next section in your course of instruction.
quizEnd.lblFailed: Your score was {0}%. You may want to review the section and try this quiz again.

reference.refDliInstructions: Click on a link below to download lesson summary PDFs.

sectionEnd.lblCourseComplete:
You have completed your required Course of Instruction and the Post-Test. To receive credit, you MUST take the brief Post-Course Assessment Survey. Select the survey link in the tree on the left side of this browser window. Once completed, click 'Submit' to receive your final congratulations notice. Exit the course to print your certificate from your student desktop.
Please remember, if you do not complete the survey and exit the course, you can always come back later.
sectionEnd.lblSectionComplete: You have successfully completed the section. Click 'NEXT' to continue to the next section in this lesson.
sectionEnd.lblSectionFailed: Your score does not allow you to progress to the next section. Please review the section again.
sectionEnd.lblLessonComplete: Congratulations! You have successfully completed this lesson. Click 'NEXT' to continue to the next lesson in the course.
